title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7033.6 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7033.6 - Confidentiality

State Regulations
(a) Information, however received, pursuant to this Part which is confidential as required by
law shall be kept confidential by the party receiving such information and any
limitation on the release of such information imposed by law upon any party
furnishing the information shall also apply to the party receiving such
information. (b) Any disclosure of
confidential material made pursuant to this Part shall be limited to that
information which is necessary in light of the reason for disclosure. (c) The chief administrative officer and the
medical director of each local correctional facility shall develop and
implement policies and procedures to ensure the safekeeping of all confidential
records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7033.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
